text: Anage hige'na kogeno, anagamu noti kaziga kuma kafama me'nea kazigati 6si'a vene'neramina vahe'ma zamahe fri ha'zana zamazampina eriri eriri hu'za neazageno, anampina efeke kukena hu'nemo afafafina avontafe'ma kre vogisi me'negeno e'ne. Hagi ana vahe'mo'za agu'afi ufre'za bronsire itamofo asoparega uoti'naze.
